Text: It's up to me... I have to stop her!
Yunica: \n Shifter, we need your help!
Permet: \n Some kind of energy comes down whenever she holds her hand up.
Permet: \n Do whatever you can to avoid it!
Permet: \n Heat signature rising, she's up to something.
Yunica: \n I'm still good to fight!
Yunica: \n Good, stay with us, Sea Slug!
That field surrounding her is gone!
Yunica: \n Micro missiles took down her field!
Yunica: \n The field must be weak against the heat from explosions.
Yunica: \n Sea Slug, try your micro missiles.
Yunica: \n Sea Slug, take down that protective field!
Yunica: \n Her field must be vulnerable to explosions.
I feel the power flowing through me!
I can't let the town get destroyed!
I can't let this \n happen... Everyone, \n the town...
But I can't do it... I \n don't have the \n strength...
I... hear her. \n From inside me.
I... I always knew we \n were connected somehow.
I can't... give up. I \n have to save this town!
Yunica: \n Her field's back! What now?
Yunica: \n That's it, take that field down!
Yunica: \n Shifter, use the missiles to take out her protective field!
Yunica: \n There might be some missiles we fired at the Nevi down below.
Yunica: \n Okay, take out the field!
Yunica: \n That's it, use the missiles to take out her protective field.
I'll look for those un-exploded missiles.
I have to find those missiles!
Now to chuck this into that monster!
I'll do whatever it takes to stop that thing!
I won't let anything happen to my home!
With this power, I can take down that field.
